entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:19 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
